abstract: Spyker, the Dutch carmaker, said on Tuesday that it was trying to find financing to resume production at Saab’s plant in Sweden, possibly through asset sales.
snippet: Spyker, the Dutch carmaker, said on Tuesday that it was trying to find financing to resume production at Saab’s plant in Sweden, possibly through asset sales.
lead_paragraph: Spyker, the Dutch carmaker, said on Tuesday that it was trying to find financing to resume production at Saab’s plant in Sweden, possibly through asset sales.

headline.main: Spyker Seeks Cash to Restart Saab
